summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley discussing a potential meeting during a trip to London. The email emphasizes confidentiality and includes a disclaimer about attorney-client privilege.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing a meeting with Jes Staley.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email, who is mentioned in the context of a planned meeting.

connections.description: Epstein is reaching out to Staley regarding a potential meeting during a trip to London.

keyFacts: It discusses a potential meeting between Epstein and Staley.
The email contains a confidentiality disclaimer and mentions attorney-client privilege.
The email is marked as confidential and requests confidential treatment by JPMorgan Chase.
There is a mention of an email address that appears to be redacted.
